mapper.select: SELECT place_id,place_name,COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) AS address_name ,place_url,place_img,place_long,place_lat,place_category_detail FROM camping WHERE COALESCE(road_address_name, address_name) LIKE concat('%', #{region}, '%') order by #{sort_type} #{order} limit #{start},10;
